column1: Back in NYC today and enjoyed meeting with @JimOwles to discuss my work in Congress. TY for always supporting me and together we will move forward for a more equal & just America without regard to race color religion origin sex gender identity or sexual orientation. https://t.co/SB26ent8QY

Too many students in our schools have unaddressed learning disabilities. Congratulations to these parents - including my friend @JeannineKiely - for leading the way in creating a new model to ensure every student gets the resources they need!   https://t.co/dd2AcS78kh
Stand with Lucy against these personal attacks! https://t.co/xY2hojiFud
Welcome Sochie—Looking forward to working with you and building a more progressive NY! https://t.co/aGIOErwj5E

🚨BREAKING🚨 The House Judiciary committee has passed 1st ever legislation to decriminalize marijuana & start repairing the damage of the misguided war on drugs. Will you sign my petition to show your support? #WeWantMORE https://t.co/O8E1xvpBkv

From calling all negative coverage "fake news" to undermining the ability of the EPA to use the best science available the Trump administration is trying to blind Americans from seeing the terrible consequences of its actions. https://t.co/512VUL3kBx
New York - Polls are open until 9PM! Don’t forget to vote today. And remember Yes on Question 1 - Ranked Choice Voting!
Thank you @LIDbrooklyn for your advocacy on behalf of the LGBTQ community and your support. We’ll keep fighting for a more fair and equal country together! https://t.co/rjb3BaQGjf

Our nation’s healthcare system is designed to make maximum profits for insurance companies & drug companies - thank you @DickGottfried & @NYSenatorRivera for leading the way on #NYHA to create a single payer system in NYS! https://t.co/ThSNQuydRc
Today the Democratic House is holding the first ever hearing on the #MuslimBan. It is the first one because Republicans refused to hold ANY for two years afterwards. #ElectionsMatter
At first it was just us & a handful of attorneys but by that night thousands of people across the country would be standing at airports to demand the administration reverse its unlawful order.
Early in the morning on January 28 2017 @ReElectNydia and I rushed to #JFK to help individuals being held as a result of Trump's discriminatory #MuslimBan. https://t.co/AZJmpNOy7i
Called this up for the Committee vote & looking forward to getting the #FAIRAct to the floor! 👇👇 https://t.co/cX12y8GT4H

On Labor Day we should do more than honor workers - we should ensure they are able to access justice. #ForcedArbitration allows companies to undermine workers their rights & deny them a day in court. We need to pass the Restoring Justice for Workers Act to end it.

The House passed Universal Background Checks in FEBRUARY - but McConnell & the Trump Republicans in the Senate are refusing to act. Join me in calling on them to stop blocking progress on common sense gun reform! https://t.co/w4uYYgzQIJ
Good friends & food at @ManhattanPolicy’s BBQ! With @BenKallos & @NYSenBenjamin https://t.co/49ksVnPBTe
Great to join @CRDCNYC & @DickGottfried for some summer fun! https://t.co/Zgax1NCgnR

TY @CollegeDemsNY for inviting me to speak at your fellows dinner reception.  Proud to support your efforts to get students involved in political campaigns.  Let the blue wave continue! https://t.co/pD7w2qqfN2

LGBTQ workers deserve clear unambiguous federal recourse in the face of discrimination which is why I'm incredibly proud the House passed the #EqualityAct. Now the Senate must change so it can do the same #ElectionsMatter  https://t.co/DLQfPwkwt1

NYC! Don’t forget there are primaries tomorrow. In the only contested District Leader race in the 10th CD I’m supporting Steven Skyles-Mulligan of @CRDCNYC in Chelsea! Check to see who is on your ballot here:  https://t.co/dXqZH29NB3 https://t.co/GXwlrGEx2c

Brooklyn - Don’t forget to vote for Judge Margarita López Torres for Surrogate Court tomorrow! She has my support so we can keep progressive champions on the bench. Polls open from 6AM-9PM https://t.co/bZjEuYrOUk

Had an amazing time last night with @NARAL at our pro-choice happy hour! Great discussion of the issues and what we need to do for the #2020 elections—thank you again  for your support and endorsement https://t.co/oGqSmgSqX4
Thank you NARAL! So proud to have your support and proud to stand with you now & always in this fight. https://t.co/McooHh4JBi
Thank you for the joyous night @HKDemsNYC - I  never could have expected the serenade! Your activism & advocacy is much needed in the neighborhood https://t.co/ttk5CWfdep

Great night tonight with @swingleft and a packed house of supporters! They know we must mobilize early  to protect our House majority and win the Senate and White House & they are already hard at work. I’m proud to continue to fight alongside you for #2020!
Yesterday the Democratic House Majority passed legislation to protect #DREAMers & #TPS holders. #ElectionsMatter
Happy Pride! 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈   Last month - for the first time ever - the House passed a comprehensive LGBT civil rights bill the #EqualityAct. #ElectionsMatter

TY @JustinBrannan for honoring me at the 1st annual dinner of @BayRidgeDems.  It’s amazing the impact that you and your club have had on our City & State with the election of @AndrewGounardes @MaxRose4NY @FrontusforNY and yourself.  Looking forward to working with you in 2020! https://t.co/kE0npg3RGO https://t.co/z4nfJLc4p9

Congratulations ⁦@CBIDems⁩ on 50 years of progressive activism in Brooklyn.   Always proud to fight alongside you in making NYC and our country a better place for all of us to live. https://t.co/KGHZgFgNvB
Thank you @CarlinaRivera for your support! NYC is also lucky to have such a strong advocate for families residents and housing justice in the @NYCCouncil! https://t.co/DxBixfywMs

Thrilled to join @DIDNYC & @villagedems today for a Town Hall! We had a great conversation from fighting for our democratic government climate change and protecting Roe v Wade among many topics! https://t.co/gV4SwPupKm
History is made by victories like today’s. Proud to pass the #EqualityAct & join @LIDbrooklyn to celebrate #Stonewall50! https://t.co/boIMjmxStz
Join me this Sunday at 3 pm at a forum hosted by @villagedems and @DIDNYC. Looking forward to a great discussion! https://t.co/HYxRzHjJfH

What a great evening! Proud to support the important work of @VoteMamaUS — They’re breaking down barriers to running for office and fighting for policies that will help families and strengthen our society as a whole. https://t.co/rGUCAEcfL3

Thank you @CRDCNYC for your long-standing support and the award on Saturday for Outstanding Service and Leadership to the Preservation of Democracy.  It is a honor to represent you in Congress and work with you on progressive politics in NYC.   https://t.co/R5dkKOqrTv
Great to join @AnsoniaDems on this rainy Sunday! Together we can continue to elect great leaders from the westside! https://t.co/NipUjusxR0

TY @CRDCNYC for the award today and the honor & recognition at your annual brunch. You are a wonderful partner in progressive democratic politics in NYC and I thank you for always supporting me and my work in Congress. https://t.co/eDJJmUXP4U

Yesterday: Introduced New-Bipartisan Bill Package on Prescription Drug Costs Today: first #ERAHearing in 30yrs Tomorrow: first ever #EqualityAct Markup Thursday: Oversight hearing on AG Barr & the Mueller Report.

A Democratic Majority matters! Together we can fight for our communities & our country.   Last week: I defended NYCHA tenants at #FultonHouses held 9/11 Victim Compensation Info Session spoke at #GreenNewDeal Town Hall and announced deal on Verrazano Two-Way Toll.

#BroadwayDemocrats TY for your long-standing support.  With your backing at home in NYC I’m able to go to Washington and fight for progressive democratic values from civil rights and civil liberties to upholding the rule of law to fighting for the #GreenNewDeal https://t.co/BDcY2DlNqx

Proud to join @3ParksDems a great grassroots democratic club on the #UWS in recognizing your terrific NYS Senators & honorees @RJackson_NYC @NYSenBenjamin.  Together we took back @NYSenate made NY Blue and defeated the #IDC. https://t.co/X03GNER22v

Always good to be @DIDNYC annual event and TY for everything you do for progressive democratic politics in Lower Manhattan.  Congratulations to @yuhline on your honor and a very touching tribute by the club to the late community activist Tom Goodkind. https://t.co/NhB62dW1UM

Trump has never been able to hear “no.” No taxpayers shouldn’t subsidize his luxury towers; no lying doesn’t make him a leader; no Presidents do not get to override the rule of law. https://t.co/Jjs7O2Tx6G
Thank you @KathyHochul for joining me @cfdnyc Spring Gala and presenting me with CFD Maggi Peyton Freedom Award. https://t.co/ZDhhK4wqQF

Congratulations @cfdnyc on 50 years of progressive politics on the UWS.  What a terrific day to share with great elected officials @KathyHochul @NYCComptroller @LindaBRosenthal @chuckschumer @DickGottfried @bradhoylman https://t.co/MIHyOh5YFM
Democracy demands participation! Glad to join @CRDCNYC to help petition for district leaders - the folks who build our party from the ground up! https://t.co/5mbjxFewQI

Lovely cold snowy morning in NYC.  But it’s warm in the Village at the VID Petitioning Kickoff Breakfast where we honored Keen Berger who is retiring as District Leader.  Thank you Keen for all you have done for progressive democratic politics. https://t.co/ob6PuTusRz
Congratulations to New York City’s next Public Advocate @JumaaneWilliams! I look forward to fighting together for all New Yorkers.
If you haven’t already voted don’t forget polls are open until 9pm citywide as we chose our next Public Advocate! #NYCvotes

At Marjory Stoneman Douglas HS in #Parkland one year ago 17 students and educators lost their lives. This year we held the first hearing on gun violence in 8 years and yesterday we advanced #HR8 the first major gun legislation in decades. Elections matter.
Congratulations @yuhline! Proud to see you representing NYC. https://t.co/CoHRMkQPub

It has been 8 years since Congress last held a hearing on gun violence. 8 long years. 1000s of deaths. This week we change that.    Together we knocked doors and made calls. Elections matter. Voting matters. Volunteering makes a difference.
Elections matter. After nearly a decade of silence from Congress I’m calling a hearing on preventing gun violence next week. #TimetoAct   https://t.co/UerhIgKkFZ
New York State is blazing ahead - early voting pre-registration consolidated primaries #GENDA conversion therapy ban #RHA #CCCA & #DREAMAct among others. Years of progress in just a few weeks!

Trans people are not a burden. Trans people are not a burden. Trans people are not a burden. Trans people are not a burden. Trans people are not a burden. Trans people are not a burden. Trans people are not a burden.  We will keep fighting the #TransMilitaryBan. https://t.co/YXghCB6jxR
Great profile of my dear friend and colleague—progressive powerhouse ⁦@PramilaJayapal⁩! Proud to work side by side with her on ⁦@HouseJudiciary⁩ and ⁦⁦⁦@USProgressives⁩  https://t.co/8vYyJuTkiT
